EmailTemplate.name: 2016Q4.Global.NUR.2130.XLE Finance.Email 2 - Digital Transformation for Finance
EmailTemplate.subject: Infographic: Banking on digital transformation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Digital transformation for financial services infographic Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Did you know that 180 million online bank users are expected to grow to 208 million by 2018?
Digital banking is changing the face of finance, bringing with it new challenges and opportunities. Get a glimpse into the benefits of the banking digital evolution and how you can capitalize on it in our infographic: How Digital Transformation Can Reinvent Banking. If you would like to have a Nokia representative contact you, please click here <[[https://networks.nokia.com/how-to-buy]]>
I hope you enjoy the read.
Michael Williams Financial Services Manager, Global Enterprise Marketing | Nokia Connect with us © 2017 Nokia. Contact us <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/contact]]> | Privacy policy <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/privacy]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
